description:
RangeRect is a low-level component to be used in XYPlot-type charts (namely AreaBarChart).
It is a rectangle which represents a range (min & max) of values on both (X & Y) axes.
It takes a single datum object, and getters which specify how to retrieve the range values from it.

xScale.description: D3 scale for the X (horizontal) axis.

yScale.description: D3 scale for the Y (vertical) axis.

x.description: Starting (minimum) X value (left edge, usually) of the rectangle range

xEnd.description: Ending (maximum) X value (right edge, usually) of the rectangle range

y.description: Starting (minimum) Y value (bottom edge, usually) of the rectangle range

yEnd.description: Ending (maximum) Y value (top edge, usually) of the rectangle range

className.description: Class attribute to be applied to the rectangle element

style.description: Inline style object to be applied to the rectangle element

onMouseMove.description: `mousemove` event handler callback, called when user's mouse moves within the rectangle.

onMouseEnter.description: `mouseenter` event handler callback, called when user's mouse enters the rectangle.

onMouseLeave.description: `mouseleave` event handler callback, called when user's mouse leaves the rectangle.
